modName: PS Universal PC NPC Body Changer
summary: Dialogue, spell, and MCM based IN-GAME body changer for PLAYER and ANY NPCs : 12 mesh x 36 textures each : Better males, Robert male, UNPB, CBBE, SevenBase, CHSBHC, ADEC, UNP, CBBE slim, DreamGirl, Rebirth, and Pandora meshes; retextures, realgirls, SG retextures as alternate textures.  Use as the body shape variety, or modify them.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [heading] This is a [color=yellow] STANDALONE mod [/color] with the [color=yellow] DIALOGUE, SPELL, and SkyUI MCM [/color] interface that allows the player to
change the [color=yellow] BODY of ANY PC and NPCs IN-GAME[/color] between [color=yellow] 12 MESHES with 36 TEXTURES [/color] each.

[color=yellow] What you can do with this mod [/color]
- Customize the body and skin texture of any PC & NPCs up to 100
- Simultaneously use armors designed for different bodies without the skin mismatch problem
- Test different body, skin, and tattoo mods without having to worry about losing your current setting


This mod requires [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender [/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863/?] SkyUI [/url], and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888] BBP, TBBP, or XP32 skeleton [/url].


Please [color=yellow]SPREAD the WORDs [/color] about this mod so that more armor modders can be more free to experiment with new body shapes.

[color=yellow] CHECK the IMAGES [/color] for Simple Operating Instructions.

This mod does not change the face (HEAD) in any way.

All meshes and textures are belong to the respective owners (see Special Thanks section), and the author thanks for their hard and excellent works. Please ENDORSE them.
[/center] [/heading]

[heading] [color=yellow] Version History [/color] [/heading]
------ 2.20b - 2013/12/08 -----
[list] [*] Now with male support [*] Automatic PC body update by unequip / equip currently wearing armor [*] Diagnostic menu to check whether or not mod is functioning properly [*] Added automatic version control checker and updater [/list]

------ 2.00b - 2013/11/27 -----
[list] [*] [color=yellow] WARNING : [/color] You will lose your previous setring when you upgrade. Don't worry body/skin combinatorial is the last major intended design of the framework. [*] Upgraded the framework by decoupling body and texture selection [*] Expanded body mesh slots to 12 [*] Expanded skin texture slots to 36 [*] Fixed missing race selection for M0 - M2 slots [/list]

------ 1.20b - 2013/11/24 -----
[list] [*] ESM version of 1.20a [*] --- [color=yellow] WARNING [/color] for people who overzealously modified their NPCs that you will lose your settings [*] --- Although I will continuously release ESP versions, without ESM framework, it's really hard to change mesh and texture names. [/list]

------ 1.20a - 2013/11/24 -----
[list] [*] Now SkyUI is mandatory to keep track of reload. [*] Found and fix body change setting lost when you close Skyrim and load your save by adding Persistance Manager that tracks and enforces the settings up to 100 characters when you load. [*] --- Above problem can be also ironically fixed very easily by loading your save TWICE when you start... (Load order problem maybe?) [*] Added MCM menu for batch (or multiple) manipulations. [*] --- Summon multiple characters. [*] --- Apply body settings [*] --- Delete from Persistence Manager List [*] First implementation of MessageBox name based renaming framework [/list]

------ 1.10a - 2013/11/23 -----
[list] [*] Add Alteration Spell interface to change bodies of Player and unfriendly non-talking mood NPCs (Bandit maruder maybe...) [*] Add Reset button - bottom of "PC Body Change" dialogue - to reset in version update and get spells [/list]

------ 1.00a - 2013/11/22 -----
[list] [*] Initial release [/list]

[heading] [color=yellow] How to use this mod : [/color] [/heading]
--- Walk up to the "any humanoid NPC of interest and talk to them.
--- Choose "PS Body Change"
--- Select body option of your interest

*** If you don't see the selection, the control quest didn't start.
*** [color=yellow] Save your game, and reload. [/color]

--- Use Alteration Spell : "PS UFBC Transform PC" - For player character
--- Use Alteration Spell : "PS UFBC Alter NPC" - For hostile NPCs

*** If you don't see the spells, [color=yellow] Talk to any female -> "PC Body Change" -> "Reset UFBC" (Bottom of the list) [/color]

[heading] [color=yellow] How the files are arranged so that you can modify them : [/color] [/heading]

[SKYRIM INSTALLATION FOLDER] is often C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrim

Meshes are located in [SKYRIM INSTALLATION FOLDER]datameshesactorscharactercharacter assetspsBodyPartsMeshSet0 [-MeshSet9]

Textures are located in [SKYRIM INSTALLATION FOLDER]datatexturesactorscharactercharacter assetspsBodyPartsTextureSet0 [-TextureSet9]
--- where the matching numbers set each pair. 0 - 9 are all default textures for the body set.

Alternate textures are located in [SKYRIM INSTALLATION FOLDER]datatexturesactorscharactercharacter assetspsBodyPartsTextureSetA [-TextureSetJ]
--- where 0 matches A to 9 matches J

* These numbers and letters exactly match you see in dialogue for people who like to customize the settings

* You can change the configuration to your needs by directly extracting NIF files to MeshSet# directory and DDS files to TextureSet# directory


[heading] [color=yellow] Default Configuration Table [/color] [/heading]
[color=yellow] --- Version 2.20 --- [/color]
* Values in paranthesis are compatibility type

* Values in paranthesis are compatibility type

[color=yellow] --- Version 1.20 or below ---[/color]
MeshSet # | Body Type__________| TextureSet Code | Alternate Texture Configuration
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
___ 0____ | UNPB (Std nude) __ |______ 0, A______| Real Girls Realistic Body Texture (UNP) & Sporty Sexy Sweat - Athletic (UNP)
___ 1____ | CBBE (Std nude)___ |______ 1, B______| CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal__& Sporty Sexy Sweat - Athletic__
___ 2____ | SevenBase Bombshell|______ 2, C______| Real Girls Realistic Body Texture (UNP) & Sporty Sexy Sweat - Athletic (UNP)
___ 3____ | CHSBHC____________ |______ 3, D______| CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal & Sporty Sexy Sweat - Athletic__
___ 4____ | ADEC (Std nude)___ |______ 4, E______| ADEC female body retexture with beast races
___ 5____ | UNP(Standard)______|______ 5, F______| SG Female Textures Renewal (UNP)
___ 6____ | CBBE Slim__________|______ 6, G______| SG Female Textures Renewal (CBBE)
___ 7____ | DreamGirl (nude)___|______ 7, H______| SG Female Textures Renewal (UNP)
___ 8____ | Rebirth body______ |______ 8, I______| No alternate - Same as default
___ 9____ | Pandora body______ |______ 9, J______| No alternate - Same as default

[heading] This configuration is designed to maximize the bodytype variety not practicality.

For seasoned armor mod users, I personally recommend overwrite and divide mesh slots to UNP(B), CBBE, ADEC, or Pandora (Vanilla UV based) and [color=yellow] maximize texture configurations [/color] (skin tint, sweat, tattoo, etc.) because [color=yellow] body meshes are determined by a torso armor. [/color] [/heading]
- Texture UV Map Equivalents (a.k.a shares same body texture configuration)
----- Vanilla = Rebirth = Pandora
----- UNP = UNPB = SevenBase = DreamGirl
----- CBBE = CHSBHC
----- ADEC

[heading] [color=yellow] Special Thanks for these body meshes and their authors for the excellent work [/color] [/heading]
